string.text: Choose predefined settings from the list
The chance for predefined smart terrain to spawn anomaly zone
Maximum distance from the center of smart terrain that is allowed for anomaly zone
Defines minimum distance between anomalies in zone. Negative values will allow anomalies to overlap each other
Modifies the amount of anomalies each anomaly zone can have
Defines the maximum amount of artefacts that can spawn in an anomaly zone
Each of defined maximum amount of artefacts will have this chance to spawn

Which artefacts can be spawn is defined by the level. South locations can spawn only weak artys, while underground and north ones can spawn strong artys. However there is a chance, defined by this value, that an anomaly zone can spawn any artefact, including unique ones
Modifier of screen shake near gravitational anomalies
Modifier of damage of electric fields. Does not affect glitches of electronic devices
Defines if dynamic anomalies have special behaviour and can pop in and out of existence in zone
Saves the game after emission or psi-storm when dynamic anomalies are removed from the level
Disables new kinds of anomalies from spawning. The option will take effect after next emission or psy-storm or at the new game
Below you can selectively enable \nwhich new kinds of anomalies can be spawn
Deletes all generated anomaly zones from the game. This option is intended for safe removal of the mod. Enable the option, then return to the game, save the game, quit the game and remove the mod

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]레이더%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Psionic 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
A localized breach in the Noosphere. It emits a weak psionic aura, severely harming the mental health of anyone staying within its vicinity, by scrambling their brain wave frequencies. Unlike regular psi-fields, stalkers tend to avoid these anomalies entirely, since their influence bypasses any conventional means of psionic protection, affecting the victim's mind directly.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]다크니스%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Psionic 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
A terrifying and deadly anomalous formation of unknown origin, affecting the mind of any sentient being within its vicinity. It resembles a cluster of moving shadows. There are rumours that the anomaly also acts as a shelter for poltergeists. One of the most dangerous anomalies ever recorded in the Zone.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]플래시%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Temporal 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
A rift in the space-time continuum. Any creature caught in these anomalies, experiences a rapid time-travel of unknown temporal extent. Despite their seemingly dangerous nature, some stalkers cleverly use these rifts for their own purposes, such as escaping from pursuit or waiting for the best moment to snatch an artefact.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]고스트%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Electrical/Chemical 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
A spherical, electro-chemical anomaly. Its most distinctive feature is that it moves along a fixed path within a certain area, as if aware of its surroundings and in search for prey. This behavioural pattern gave rise to many metaphysical theories, suggesting that this anomaly may actually be a sentient manifestation, rather than a natural abnormality.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]액체 황금%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Chemical 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
Considered as a twin sister of the "Fruit Punch" anomaly, "Liquid Gold" emits a cloud of orange/gold toxic chemical substance. This substance raises the victim's body temperature to levels beyond feverish, and at an extremely fast rate, triggering a wide range of symptoms depending on the anomaly's potency: from severe dehydration, to an instant death caused by the victim's blood reaching its boiling point.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]그린 드래곤%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Chemical 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
An anomalous cloud of unknown chemical composition. This cloud - classified as poisonous - adversely affects the biological functions of any trapped organism, greatly hindering their motor skills. Physical actions involving fast movement, like running or jumping, are very hard to perform within its vicinity.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]메피스토펠레스%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Electrical/Chemical 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
Taking its name after the trickster demon of medieval folklore, this strange flower-like formation emits an eerie sound when any living organism approaches it. Victims entering its active radius, are instantly drawn to its center and shredded into pieces. A beautiful, yet extremely dangerous anomaly.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]넷%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Gravitational/Electrical 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
This formation is a stream of charged particles, further accelerated by gravitational forces. Any object within the anomaly's effective radius, gets rapidly enveloped by these particles, in a similar fashion to that of a net, hence its namesake.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]라이팅 볼%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Electrical 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
An anomaly of electrical nature, reminiscent of the famous and yet unexplained natural phenomenon. It has an unconfirmed interaction with electrical objects, especially with batteries and capacitors, allegedly charging them with electric energy. Nevertheless, unless heavily protected, it is strongly advised not to approach the anomaly.

- 이름: %c[d_cyan]리바운더%c[ui_gray_1] 
- 종류: %c[d_orange]Gravitational 
 
%c[pda_green]정보%c[ui_gray_1] 
This gravitational anomaly is a dense concentration of multiple force waves, forming some kind of disc perpendicular to the ground. The disc can act as an unorthodox shield or cover, that repels or reduces the speed of fast moving objects, such as bullets or other projectiles. Some more experienced stalkers have been witnessed using the "Rebounder" to their advantage during combat situations.
